mapper.insert: insert into up_matchclueinfo (up_aicode, up_aiappraise, up_aistatus, up_usercode, up_aitimes, up_aicreatetime, up_aiexecutetime, up_aipersontime, up_aitaskid, up_aiphone, extra1, extra2, extra3, extra4, extra5, up_cluename, up_aipersonendtime, up_aiendtime, up_talktime) values (#{upAicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAiappraise,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upAistatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUsercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAitimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upAicreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAiexecutetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAipersontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAitaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAiphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upCluename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAipersonendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAiendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upTalktime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

up_aicode,

up_talktime,

#{upAitimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select: select up_aicode,up_aiphone from up_matchclueinfo where up_usercode = #{userId} and up_aistatus = '1'

select up_aicode, up_aiappraise, up_aistatus, up_usercode, up_aitimes, up_aicreatetime, up_aiexecutetime, up_aipersontime, up_aitaskid, up_aiphone, extra1, extra2, extra3, extra4, extra5, up_cluename from up_matchclueinfo where upAicode = #{upAicode} and upUsercode = #{upUsercode}
mapper.update: update up_matchclueinfo set up_aiappraise = #{upAiappraise,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_aistatus = #{upAistatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_aitimes = #{upAitimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up_aicreatetime = #{upAicreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aiexecutetime = #{upAiexecutetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aipersontime = #{upAipersontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aitaskid = #{upAitaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_aiphone = #{upAiphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra4 = #{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra5 = #{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_cluename = #{upCluename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where up_aicode = #{upAicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and up_usercode = #{upUsercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
